mapper.select: SELECT color_id, user_id, name, hex_code FROM snippet_colors
SELECT color_id, user_id, name, hex_code FROM snippet_colors WHERE user_id IS NULL
SELECT color_id, user_id, name, hex_code FROM snippet_colors WHERE user_id IS NULL OR user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY user_id IS NULL DESC, name ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM snippet_colors WHERE hex_code = #{hexCode} AND user_id IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO snippet_colors(user_id, name, hex_code) VALUES(#{userId}, #{name}, #{hexCode})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM snippet_colors WHERE color_id = #{colorId} AND user_id = #{userId}
